attributes.action: request that all Bankers give their bonuses to the people of Haiti.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has asked that members of the public, give what little money they have to the people of Haiti, who are suffering such an enormous tragedy.

I suggest that the Prime Minister should first direct his request to the Bankers of "The City", whose estimated bonuses are £50 billion. It would solve all the people of Haiti's problems in one fell swoop.
